articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Europe News: Conservative billionaire politician Olivier Dassault was killed on Sunday in a helicopter crash, French President Emmanuel Macron said on Twitter.
articles.title: French billionaire politician Olivier Dassault killed in helicopter crash - Times of India

articles.author: Sarah Mooney
articles.content:
The Taoiseach has indicated that the Government is not in favour of the idea of a “vaccine bonus” in Ireland.
This would see those who are fully vaccinated against Covid-19 enjoy loosened restrictio… [+1452 chars]
articles.description: The European Union had decided it will issue vaccination certs
articles.title: ‘Vaccine bonus’ with greater freedom for those inoculated unlikely, Taoiseach indicates - BreakingNews.ie
